SerializeWithObjectCounter

Class SerializableEnclosure

  • java.lang.Object
    • SerializeWithObjectCounter.SerializableEnclosure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SerializableEnclosure
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Enclosure class that read and/or write serielizable object while counting them
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        numOfItems - The maximum number of items in main object to be counted
